name: Edge
description:
Edge is a different kind of creative agency that challenges the way brands engage by fusing advertising and content. With strategy and creation at its core, Edge stands at the crossroads of big brand ideas and personal digital experiences to make brands relevant. Relentlessly.
To do this, Edge’s staff includes creatives, strategists, filmmakers, editors, journalists, and media buyers – all working to provide brands with a holistic suite of marketing communications that integrates content and advertising.
Edge has offices in Sydney and Melbourne.
